'''Exquisite Gift (Furnishing)''' is a quest reward during [[Buyer's Guide to the Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder]].

Once obtained, it is automatically exchanged for the similar [[Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder]] furnishing.
